divs: sighting detailslast sunday in march, i was driving down pleasant rd towards carowinds to meet a friend at a target. time was approximately 7:30 pm. pleasant rd has a mix of business locations and neighborhoods. this happened close to an industrial area \ business park. spotted a bright silver object in the sky. it looked like it was made of metal. could not hear any sound. there were several tornado warnings at this time and the object was slowly ascending into the storm clouds. appeared to have legs and antennas. bright lights were flashing on both sides of object. object seemed to be several stories up. although there was some moderate lightning in the area, this object caught my eye because of its extremely bright flashing lights. i live 15 minutes away from an airport and this object was well below planes that were coming in for a landing or just leaving the airport. i watched it until it permanently dissapeared into the clouds.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fort Mill
There were no other sightings in Fort Mill on or around March 28th 2010
Summary: During bad storm, spotted a metallic silver round object with flashing lights. Appeared to have some type of antennas and legs.
